You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesX X] > &xopf;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Xopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D54F.
  * `&xopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D569.
